text:
="preserve">Harald Rolf Maartmann (5 January 1926 – 1 January 2021) was a Norwegian cross-country skier. He competed in the 1950s. He won both the 17 km and the 50 km event in the Norwegian Championships in 1950. Maartmann also finished eighth in the 50 km event at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo.
Maartmann died on 1 January 2021 in Oslo, aged 94.
